Oculus Styleguide

  • 0.0: Overview
  • 1.0: Forms

1.0 - Forms

Reusable components that can be used across the site. So far this just includes buttons.

Default styling

 
<input type="text" class="{{modifier_class}}" value="Text input"/>

Reusable components that can be used across the site. So far this just includes buttons.

Default styling

 
<input type="text" class="{{modifier_class}}" value="Text input"/>
